sentences.en: He is on the margin of bare subsistence.
In many systems of permanent subsistence agriculture, domesticated animals play an important role.
sentences.cn: 在许多固定的自给农业系统中, 家畜起着重要的作用.

sentences.en: In the traditional subsistence farm, output and consumption are identical.
sentences.cn: 在传统的维持生存的农业中, 生产和消费相等.
这是你们的粮食仓库 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many families are living below the level of subsistence.
Many of the families are forced to live at the subsistence level.
sentences.cn: 很多家庭被迫生活在基本生活水准线上。

sentences.en: Most of the population lives at subsistence level.
sentences.cn: 大多数人过着勉强糊口的生活.

sentences.en: She had no means of subsistence and was dependent on charity.
sentences.cn: 她没什么谋生手段,只能依靠救济.

sentences.en: Subsistence has been increased and perfected by a series of successive arts.
sentences.cn: 生活资料是由一系列顺序相承的技术使之增加并臻于完美的.

sentences.en: Subsistence is not possible in such conditions.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下是无法生存的.

sentences.en: Subsistence only increases in an arithmetic ratio.
sentences.cn: 生活资料只能按算术级数增长.

sentences.en: The land provided subsistence and little more.
sentences.cn: 这块土地只能提供人们的基本生活所需，别无富余。

sentences.en: The standard of living today is on the edge of subsistence.
sentences.cn: 现在的生活水平几乎快要无法维持生计。

sentences.en: Their main mode of subsistence is hunting.
Their subsistence comes from the sea.
They were living barely above the level of subsistence.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活水平勉强在最低水平线以上.

sentences.en: What are the characteristics of the people who live in families with less than minimum - subsistence income?
sentences.cn: 家庭收入少于维持生存最低收入的那些人究竟具有哪一些特点?

phrases.tran_cn: 勉强糊口的生活水平；贫困生存线；维持生活的最低水平

trans.tran_cn: 存活，生存，生计，维生之道
trans.tran_en: the condition of only just having enough money or food to stay alive
